meanings.definition: Having irregular patches of two colors, typically black and white.
meanings.sent1: The piebalds cat had a unique coat with black and white patches.
meanings.sent2: The Dalmatian dog's piebalds fur made it stand out in the park.
meanings.sent3: The piebalds cow looked like it had been painted by a clumsy artist.
meanings.sent4: The piebalds landscape was a patchwork of contrasting colors.
meanings.sent5: The piebalds butterfly fluttered gracefully among the flowers.

meanings.sent1: The farmer's piebalds grazed peacefully in the meadow.
meanings.sent2: The piebalds at the petting zoo were a favorite among children.
meanings.sent3: The piebalds in the stable seemed to have their own secret language.
meanings.sent4: The piebalds trotted proudly in the show ring, drawing all eyes.
meanings.sent5: The piebalds neighed softly as they enjoyed the sunny day.

meanings.sent3: He piebalds his car with stickers to make it stand out in the parking lot.
